Order
EM1501

EMAT+PET in one device.
Pulsed electromagnet.

Measures thickness through a gap of up to 7 mm (the largest value compared to the other EMA thickness gauges).
Learn more
Inspection of hot objects heated up to 750 °C
A-scan, B-scan and C-scan analysis
Operating gap:
up to 7 mm

Oktanta offers the top NDT inspection technologies in the world, helping manufacturers and maintenance companies to boost productivity, prevent accidents and protect the ecosystem. Our main priority is to provide advanced ultrasonic and electromagnetic testing equipment including instruments, sensors, software and robotic solutions to key industries such as aviation, energy, mining, power generation, and transportation.
